channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: The surprising link between Covid-19 deaths and lack of internet access. https://t.co/lnQ1BSrYBs
I love to eat.
You must listen to the latest episode of Radio Open Source on nuclear warfare past and present. https://t.co/VOsV4kTa7k
Thanks to @jeffjarvis for the recommendation of Elie Mystal's audiobook. Just listened to the first hour. It's irreverent, direct, eye-opening and important. https://t.co/XOsSdtmY2p
@mistersugar That isn’t necessary. If you have the time listen to todays podcast.

BTW the first feed was mine. Here’s the announcement. https://t.co/cK8fMop2hk This is why we needed blogging before anything else. It was the way new tech innovation could be announced when journalism was ignoring it.

I can’t imagine Lebron has any fans left after he’s left so many teams. It’s not just that he wins championships, it’s that he leaves behind wrecks. Fans don’t want to win as much as we want to love. I’m glad he never chose the Knicks. https://t.co/1tS1mYrNpf
I can’t imagine another team accepting LeBron unless he swears he will leave the team in better condition than he found it. That would be something worth giving a try. go to Orlando, for example, and don’t bring any stars with you, just work. And do it for a dollar a year.

BTW the first feed was mine. Here’s the announcement. This is why we needed blogging before anything else. It was the way new tech innovation could be announced when journalism was ignoring it. https://t.co/Nt4PVoXerR https://t.co/cK8fMop2hk
Deaths of Russian Generals Expose Vulnerabilities. https://t.co/wKq0YqIdNe

This is encouraging. Not the final deal, but not a terrible one either. @sarahkendzior -- who I usually agree with, does not like it. I don't Russia is any old autocracy, they have the nukes. Think past this step where the nukes go away if that's possible. How to get there? https://t.co/BGMnVXROHc
Sarah -- highly recommend listening to the current episode of Radio Open Source about nuclear war.
https://t.co/VOsV4kTa7k
@sabre23t that was not necessary.

@Kasparov63 I'm sure you understand Russia much better than I do, but still, I think it's worth a chance to see if the situation doesn't get resolved without destroying civilization. Once we're in a shooting war with Russia there will be no more time to think.
The Cheapest New Electric Cars You Can Buy in 2022. https://t.co/cjjLhVAN6d

I revel in how much the Lakers suck. Feel bad for the individual players except Lebron whose hubris is the fatal flaw. And poor Melo, he was desperately hoping to at least be on a playoff team. https://t.co/7cg7FD9v7v
And Bloomberg— there’s no amount of money they should take to further tarnish their name than Exxon. When I hear the name Bloomberg on Twitter this is what I think of now: “Don’t click. Paywall.”

What a disgusting combo. Fuck you bloomberg and esp fuck you Exxon, we don’t need to capture fucking carbon that was never fucking dumped into our fucking atmosphere. https://t.co/pAE6zPvOaZ
Exxon is one of those names like Hitler and Facebook that they should change because you might as well call your company Evil Corp or somesuch.

The senate Repubs approved billions in aid to Ukraine, but denied Americans help in fighting a war in the US which has already claimed a million American lives, and isn’t yet over. Repubs again.
This is a replay of the war in Iraq. Yes it’s important to help Ukraine, but senators, it’s your JOB to help Americans. Aren’t Repubs the ones who say “Americans First” all the time..
Kurt Vonnegut once called Bob Dylan the ‘worst poet alive.’ https://t.co/HaBa2bEtLH
Sorry “Trump lied” hasn’t been news since 2016. https://t.co/wFFStlLJLL
RNC sues Salesforce to block Jan. 6 committee data dump. https://t.co/U0GNUUn3ES
New York Times takes down third-party Wordle Archive. https://t.co/AbjkbJ3f6X
Google opens a domain registrar. https://t.co/KMi6Barzaw
@tcarmody yup
The Repubs and some Dems think they can make Covid go away by legislating it out of existence. Oh they are so stupid, and we're about to pay the price, again, for their stupidity.
